Description: Outcome-centered products that reduce churn, optimize pricing, and grow your subscription business end-to-end.
Name: ProfitWell

Methods.Name: Get Plan
Methods.Description: Retrieve a single manually-added plan by ID

Methods.Name: Create Plan
Methods.Description: Create a new, manually-added plan. You may create a new plan using this endpoint. Alternatively, if you create a manually-added subscription and place that subscription on a plan that has never been referenced before, that plan will automatically be created. If you try to create a plan that already exists, this endpoint will return an error.

Methods.Name: Update Plan
Methods.Description: Retrieve a single manually-added plan by ID

Methods.Name: Delete User
Methods.Description: Completely delete a user and his subscription history.

Methods.Name: Get User's Subscription History
Methods.Description: Get the history of subscription updates you've made to a user.

Methods.Name: Create Subscription
Methods.Description: Create a new subscription. Can be for a new user, or a user who already has another subscription.

Methods.Name: Un-churn Subscription
Methods.Description: Remove the churn event associated with a subscription. This rewrites history for the subscription, making it appear as thought the subscription never churned to begin with. You may do this for a subscription that has already churned, or that is set to churn in the future.

Methods.Name: List Plan IDs
Methods.Description: Retrieve your company's active plan IDs, sorted by MRR. Will only return plan IDs for which there are currently active customers, and will return at most 150.

Methods.Name: Get Daily Metrics
Methods.Description: Retrieve financial metrics broken down by day for either the current month or the last. Optionally scope to an individual metric and/or plan. See https://profitwellapiv2.docs.apiary.io/#reference/metrics/daily-metrics/get-daily-metrics for metrics to filter by.

Methods.Name: Get Monthly Metrics
Methods.Description: Retrieve all monthly financial metrics for your company. Optionally scope to an individual metric and/or plan.  See https://profitwellapiv2.docs.apiary.io/#reference/metrics/monthly-metrics/get-monthly-metrics for metrics to filter by.

Methods.Name: Exclude Customer from Metrics
Methods.Description: Exclude user's data from the calculation of all metrics.

Methods.Name: Get Company Account Settings
Methods.Description: Get your company's ProfitWell account settings. These include your company ID, name, timezone, and the currency in which your metrics are displayed.

Methods.Name: Get API Status
Methods.Description: This endpoint returns a status code of 200 if the API is operational and if you've properly authenticated. If you haven't authenticated properly, the endpoint returns a status code of 401.
